changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO company (id, name, country_code, address, phone_number, email, website, status) VALUES (RANDOM_UUID(), 'ISSoft', 'BY', '123 Main', '123-456-7890', 'contact@companya.com', 'http://www.companya.com', 'ACTIVE'), (RANDOM_UUID(), 'Coherent Solutions', 'LT', '456 Elm', '987-654-3210', 'contact@companyb.com', 'http://www.companyb.com', 'ACTIVE'), (RANDOM_UUID(), 'Google', 'US', '789 Oak', '555-555-5555', 'contact@companyc.com', 'http://www.companyc.com', 'ACTIVE');
